\n

', f) f = "

<% content = capture(caller.body) re2 = re.compile(r"'''PYESC(.+?)PYESC'''", re.S) content = re2.sub(lambda m: m.group(1), content) %>

${nav.pagenav(item=item)}
% endif back to section top % endif
